flawed_nl_solution:
Lana sold 12 muffins and has to sell 20 - 12 = 13 to hit her goal before the bake sale ends.
When she sells another 4 in the afternoon Lana has 13 - 4 = <<13-4=9>>9 muffins left to sell to meet her target.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
